00028 #include "json_spirit_value.h"
00029 #include <iostream>
00030 
00031 namespace json_spirit
00032 {
00033     // An Error_position exception is thrown by the "read_or_throw" functions below on finding an error.
00034     // Note the "read_or_throw" functions are around 3 times slower than the standard functions "read" 
00035     // functions that return a bool.
00036     //
00037     struct Error_position
00038     {
00039         Error_position();
00040         Error_position( unsigned int line, unsigned int column, const std::string& reason );
00041         bool operator==( const Error_position& lhs ) const;
00042         unsigned int line_;
00043         unsigned int column_;
00044         std::string reason_;
00045     };
00046 
00047     // functions to reads a JSON values
00048 
00049     bool read( const std::string& s, Value& value );
00050     bool read( std::istream&  is,    Value& value );
00051     bool read( std::string::const_iterator& begin, std::string::const_iterator end, Value& value );
00052 
00053     void read_or_throw( const std::string& s, Value& value );  
00054     void read_or_throw( std::istream&  is,    Value& value );
00055     void read_or_throw( std::string::const_iterator& begin, std::string::const_iterator end, Value& value );
00056 
00057 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00058 
00059     bool read( const std::wstring& s, wValue& value );
00060     bool read( std::wistream&  is,    wValue& value );
00061     bool read( std::wstring::const_iterator& begin, std::wstring::const_iterator end, wValue& value );    
00062 
00063     void read_or_throw( const std::wstring& s, wValue& value );
00064     void read_or_throw( std::wistream&  is,    wValue& value );
00065     void read_or_throw( std::wstring::const_iterator& begin, std::wstring::const_iterator end, wValue& value );
00066 
00067 #endif
00068 
00069     bool read( const std::string& s, mValue& value );
00070     bool read( std::istream&  is,    mValue& value );
00071     bool read( std::string::const_iterator& begin, std::string::const_iterator end, mValue& value );
00072 
00073     void read_or_throw( const std::string& s, mValue& value );  
00074     void read_or_throw( std::istream&  is,    mValue& value );
00075     void read_or_throw( std::string::const_iterator& begin, std::string::const_iterator end, mValue& value );
00076 
00077 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_WSTRING
00078 
00079     bool read( const std::wstring& s, wmValue& value );
00080     bool read( std::wistream&  is,    wmValue& value );
00081     bool read( std::wstring::const_iterator& begin, std::wstring::const_iterator end, wmValue& value );    
00082 
00083     void read_or_throw( const std::wstring& s, wmValue& value );
00084     void read_or_throw( std::wistream&  is,    wmValue& value );
00085     void read_or_throw( std::wstring::const_iterator& begin, std::wstring::const_iterator end, wmValue& value );
00086 
00087 #endif
